title: Top guns and toxic whales
creator_credit: Central TV, Better World Society, Television Trust for the Environment, Lawrence Moore and Robbie Stamp
brief_description: Anthony Hopkins narrates this documentary which explores the issue of environmental security, and the link between ecological crises and military expenditure. The conflict bewteen massive military expenditure and the human problems of population growth, energy source depletion, and third world debt is explored.
